page.shortlink: UX viewbox properties global events on down
page.description: Defines a default onDown event that fires when the mouse button is pressed down whenever an item in the viewbox is clicked on..

section.description: If an onDblClick event is tied to a specific item's definition, then this localized event will be used in place of the default. The default onDblClick event only fires if an item does NOT contain an onDblClick event definition.
